title: Zhongguo Qi Tan
overview: The Chinese Curious Tales has created eight independent stories rooted in Chinese traditional culture respectively because of Shui, Hu Rui, Yang Mu, Liu Maoning, Chen Lianhua and Zhou Xiaolin, Xu Ning, Gu Yang and Liu Kuang, and Pan Bin. It creates an immersive experience of "wonderland dreams, I am in it" with imagination, and leads the audience to meet different "demons".
